lines.text:
[to his captors]
I hope you all get anal herpes!
They're not just shooting the Indians... they're shooting at us!

[he and his friend are being searched by troops]
Whatever you do,okay, don't get on the ground.
You gotta get close to get the truth. You get too close, you die.

[about the government in El Salvador]
A pathological killer on the right, God-knows-what on the left, and a gutless middle.
I'm not only a fucking Irishman... I'm a fucking Viking!
Left-wing, Colonel? Eh, maybe. But I'm not a Communist. And you guys never seem to be able to tell the difference!
It is widely rumoured sir, that you are the head of the death squads terrorizing the countryside of the city!
What are the death squads, but the brain child of the CIA? But you'll run with them because they're anti-Moscow!

Is that why you're here, Colonel? Some kind of post-Vietnam experience like you need a rerun or something? You pour a hundred twenty million bucks into this place, you turn it into a military zone, so what, so you can have chopper parades in the sky?

[drunkenly waves a blade at the thugs surrounding him]
You're gonna have to fucking kill me. You ain't fucking taking me alive!
Listen, I think it's gonna blow in El Salvador real soon. I thought if you guys could get me a new press card and two grand I could get you some pretty good stuff. What do ya say?
What do you think? Rumour has it they ran the roadblock and there was an exchange of gunfire.
I got the shot! I got the shot!

You let them close down the universities, you let them wipe out the best minds in the countries, you let them kill whoever they want, you let them wipe out the Catholic Church, you let them do it all because they aren't Commies! And that, Colonel, is bull shit!
That's the biggest fucking needle I ever saw!

[about El Salvador]
There is no more God.
Senor, there are no death squads in El Salvador. The outrage of the people against the Communist threat cannot be stopped, or organized, by anyone.
What? You cannot walk in here like this!
You're real fucking pro, Boyle!
First I'll take your arms, then I'll take your legs! Then I'll take your balls, sounds like a fun game?

[doesn't understand the insults being spoken at him in Spanish]
Yeah up yours too, Jack!

[his last lines]
You don't know what it's like in El Salvador! You have no idea! Maria! *Maria!*

[about Archbishop Romero]
Very good man. Man of the people, man of God. You know, Doc, they say this man's gonna win the Nobel Peace Prize.

[in the commercial]
As you well know, I stand for nationalism, law and order, and economic prosperity. More importantly, I stand for the church... and a peaceful Salvador!

[trying to get Boyle to pay his debt]
I'm trying to run a restaurant, not a fucking bank!
So what's your sign?
Stop.
That's really cute. I thought it was slippery when wet.
I thought you were dead.
Dead? Why, do I look that bad?
Yes.
Do you follow the Catholic way
...Not exactly.
They kill people here, Boyle!
Do you believe everything you read in the papers?
Yeah I do!
Come on man, you're gonna love it here.
Listen Rich, can I crash at your place tonight? I got no other place to go man, I'll sleep in the shower, it doesn't matter.
You'd better light another joint, 'cause I got bad news for you. I don't got a place. We're evicted, man, we were gonna come stay with you and Miriam...
You mean I gave you my last two hundred bucks and got no place to stay?

[his wife has left him]
Marriage made in hell... maybe she'll be back.

[indicates the messy apartment]
Sure. Who could leave all this?
Marry me.
What?
We could have a family together!

[about his girlfriend]
I mean they could come tonight, take her away and they could kill her too!
Richard, Richard... that doesn't have anything to do with us. And you know the laws of this country. She's gonna have to go back to her home town.
I can't marry a divorced man!
God!
And you, Richard, are a bad Catholic in all ways.
How am I a bad Catholic?
You are living in sin. You drink!
Okay, yeah, once in a while...
You sleep with many women... Do you smoke marijuana?
No, that was Rock! He's a troublemaker!
And you lie. You scheming scum! What is good or decent about you? What redemption can you expect?

Well none I guess, but look... okay you got a point, I am a fucking weasel, there's no doubt about that. But think about this... If I went to church, I haven't been to church in thirty years, but if I went and I took confession, and with the communion together that'd be great! We could go to Archbishop Romero, you know he knows me, he likes me very much. I could become his Catholic worker, that'd be wonderful, I could get a little basket and collect coins...
John! John! You crazy fucking stooge, you're not that magic!
Today I am, Boyle.

[there is a letter on Boyle's door]
What does it say?
'Fuck you' in Italian.

[sees the room and crumples the letter]
Shit, she's gone back to Italy to her parents. Goddamnit!
That's too bad, Richard. But at least she left the TV.
The people would vote for Donald Duck or Genghis Khan or whoever the local cop tells them to because if they don't,
[holds up a photo of a dead boy]
this is what happens!
And you're just a real fucking pro, Boyle, that's why you can't even last two weeks with the network.
You know I'm often asked by people like yourself to examine my conscience and every now and then I do examine it.
And what do you find there, Jack?
That whatever mistakes we make down here, the alternative would be ten times worse!
If I were you, I'd get my rubber shoes on, and get to the airport.
You know you're gonna fit in really well here, you know that? You sound just like another gangster.
[claps Bentley on the shoulder and walks away]
Dumb fuck!
Do you want to go down in the history books as the man who lost El Salvador?
That's hardly the issue here! We're talking about human lives here! We're not playing some computer game! Jesus, history books? God!
I always dreamed of going to California.
It's a wacko joint. Not like El Salvador.
You know what made photographers like Robert Cappa great, Rich? They weren't after money, they captured the nobility of human suffering!
That was a great shot in Spain. The one flying through the air.
Yeah but it was more than just bodies, Rich. He got... why they died.

[about Ronald Reagan]
Can you believe that a straight man to a chimpanzee is going to be the next President of the United States? I mean, doesn't that depress you?
You could live in this country for three hundred bucks a year!

[rummages through Boyle's pack]
What the fuck is this!
Mace.
Mace, for what?
Wild dogs.
Yeah, wild dogs, that's bullshit! You've lied to me straight through, haven't you?
You want me to be honest with you?
No!
Hey, Boyle. I thought you were dead!
Well, it takes more than wishing.

[drunk]
Cathy, talk to Maria. I gotta get Maria back. Just talk to Father Paul, she'll listen to him.
Richard, you're forty-two years old. You're old enough to be her father, forget her.
I'm in love with her!

[also drunk]
I love you, Richard.

[waves a beer bottle at the gangsters]
Okay, cocksuckers, how do you like these odds, huh?
[attempts to break the end of the bottle, but it doesn't break]
You know you come off with this journalist bullshit all the goddamn time, you know that? I haven't seen one article
I wrote a book! "Flower of the Dragon"!
"Flower of the Dragon"? That was ten years ago, Boyle!
It was a big exposé!
Ten years ago! What have you written since?
Articles.
What articles?
I wrote for a right wing newspaper in El Salvador about guerillas.

[sarcastic]
Oh the one in El Salvador? Oh yeah, I read that, my whole family read that! Everyone saw that article, Boyle!

[talking to his henchmen]
Now... who will be the one among you who will rid me of this Romero?
[several men stand up. Major Max approaches one of them and gives him a single bullet]
You will be famous!

[lying in a hammock with Maria]
How bad is it here, eh?

[points at Maria]
If I had one of those, I'd be better.
[babbles in poor Spanish, trying to buy a drink]
You asshole. You know what you just said?
What?
You said you'd pay her in two menstrual cycles, you moron!

Mr. Boyle, your license has been revoked. You're driving without a license, registration, or insurance. You've got four outstanding speeding tickets, all gone to warrant. You've got forty-three unpaid parking tickets!
Jesus!
Nothing is legal about your car. Even your press card is out of date!

[surprised]
My press card's out of date? Damned.
I'm taking you in.

[is getting arrested]
Oh, uh, look, see I'm not that Richard Boyle, this, this happens all the time! There's another Richard Boyle...
Vietnam, you know, Vietnam? I mean, we invading here, or what?
I don't know what you're talking about. I was kinda young during all that. Look I got orders not to speak to the press, okay? And you're weird, so fuck off.
What the hell, I'm not with the press!

[talking to Boyle]
You know if you were Vietnamese you'd be working in a re-education camp, pulling up turnips!
Oh I never really like turnips very much, Colonel. And you don't see me applying for Vietnamese citizenship, do ya?

[furious at the sight of how rebels treat their prisoners]
Is this your sense of justice?!

[In Spanish]
It's necessary!

[Is pulled away by two rebels]
You've become just like them! You've become just like them!
This is war! You don't have the stomach for it! Get out!

[Turns around one last time]
YOU'VE BECOME JUST LIKE THEM!
